name: @plaza/whatsapp-widget
description: Embeddable WhatsApp widget for customer websites

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run concat && npm run minify
scripts.concat: cat src/_open.js src/utils.js src/tracking.js src/config.js src/message.js src/ui-tooltip.js src/ui-button.js src/ui-animations.js src/init.js src/_close.js > dist/whatsapp-widget.js
scripts.release: npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m 'Build release' && npm version
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git push && git push --tags

author: Plaza Team
